author: barvic
body:
CSC DQM Run2 histograms adjustments and fixes:
- Adjusted CSC CLCT timing histograms range for Run2 conditions
- Added histogram for DDUs Output Status monitoring
- Fixes for alphanumeric histograms for ROOT6 (returning zeroed mean values)
- Changed analysis order for summary ALCT and CLCT timing histos (for Offline processing sequence)
- Removed obsolete DCC/FED histos from online DQM configuration
- Included DDU histos for online DQM configuration
- Extended ranges for few histos in DQMOffline/Muon/CSCOfflineMonitor (to get more detailed view of overflows conditions)
  Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_4_X #9715 (original by @barvic).
title: CSC DQM Run2 histograms adjustments and fixes
